com.guitariffic.model
Class BaseTextArea

java.lang.Object
  com.guitariffic.model.BaseTextArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StyledTextArea, TextArea
public abstract class BaseTextArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The base class for the text area that appears on the left pane of the application. All impementors must be serializable and inherit from java.awt.Component.

Each version of a text area must implemented these abstract methods which are visible to clients for manipulation and serialization. This class makes no restriction on what class is to be used to implement these methods other than it must be able to be placed on a Component and carry out these abstract methods.

Version:
1.0, Nov 2011
Author:
Brian Collins
See Also:
Serialized Form

getTextAreaArray

public abstract java.lang.String[] getTextAreaArray()
Returns the text in the text area pane as an array of strings representing the individual lines of the text area. Each of these lines are associated with an EnumTextLineType.

Returns:
string array carrying each line in the text area display.

getLineType

public abstract EnumTextLineType getLineType(int lineNumber)
Returns the EnumTextLineType for the line number given as the method parameter.

Parameters:
lineNumber - line number whose type is to be ascertained.
Returns:
line type for the given line number.
